name: Spot The Difference Color
description:
Spot The Different Color, a funny easy game is coming in App Store. It's an awesome game to kill time.

GAME PLAY:
Find the different color of block in number of blocks provided in each level.

GAME MODE:
- Arcade: Touch the wrong block will lost one lives, three lives are available in this mode. When you run out of lives, game is over. If you cannot spot the different color with one minute, game is over.
- Time Attack: Spot as more different color as you can in about 1 minute.
- Hell: This is the hardest mode!!! If you cannot find the different color in about 30 SECONDS, game over!

Pass as more level as you can and share your score with friends via Leaderboard!
